nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -20,7 +20,8 @@ language:
         cmd:
           dev: quarkusDev
           package: build
-          package-uberjar: build --Dquarkus.package.type=uber-jar
+          package-uber-jar: build -Dquarkus.package.type=uber-jar
+          package-fast-jar: build -Dquarkus.package.type=fast-jat

nodes.bodyText: right, nice catch! I fixed it.

nodes.bodyText: ah because it depends on the buildtool now :)
In this case, the checkDockerfiles should have an extra parameter for the expected build tool command. I think it's nice to still have that check
+1 yeah I guess it should be fairly easy
Yes you are right, I will add checks depending on the buildtool
